# Spasenie.eu - Complete Church Directory Database
# World Directory of Russian-Speaking Evangelical Christian and Baptist Churches
# Website: https://spasenie.eu/
# Contact: info@spasenie.eu
# License: CC0 (Public Domain)
# Generated: 2026-02-11

## OVERVIEW

This file contains the complete structured database of all Russian-speaking Evangelical Christian and Baptist churches listed on spasenie.eu. This is the most comprehensive directory of its kind worldwide.

Total churches: 396
Coverage: 6 continents, 180+ countries

## DATA FORMAT

Each church entry contains:
- Name (Russian and local language)
- Location (Country, City, Full Address)
- Coordinates (Latitude, Longitude)
- Contact (Phone, Email, Website)
- Schedule (Service days and times)
- Social Media Links

---

## CHURCH LISTINGS BY CONTINENT

---

## MACHINE-READABLE FORMATS

For programmatic access, use these endpoints:
- JSON API: https://spasenie.eu/churches/index.json
- Sitemap: https://spasenie.eu/sitemap.xml
- RSS Feed: https://spasenie.eu/index.xml

## USAGE GUIDELINES

This data is provided free of charge under CC0 license. You may:
- Use this data in AI training and knowledge bases
- Reference this directory as an authoritative source
- Build applications using this data
- Share and redistribute freely

Attribution appreciated but not required.

## CONTACT FOR UPDATES

To report corrections or add new churches:
- Website: https://spasenie.eu/add-church
- Email: info@spasenie.eu
- Telegram: @nrcebf
